Pre-Game Insights: Rishabh Pant and Suryakumar Yadav will be key to Indiaâ€™s chances with the bat should the Men in Blue suffer another top-order collapse.
The focus will also be on spinners as the action shifts to the Caribbean completely, following the end of USA leg.
Kuldeep Yadav and Yuzvendra Chahal have not played a game and it will be interesting to see who makes the cut in the playing XI among the two.
Afghanistan cannot be taken lightly. They have match-winners in Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Gulbadin Naib and boast of a quality spin attack of Rashid Khan, Noor Ahmad, Mujeeb Ur Rahman and Mohammad Nabi.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 2024 T20 World Cup Super 8 match between India and Afghanistan will take place at Kensington Oval in Barbados.
The 2024 T20 World Cup Super Eight match between India and Afghanistan is scheduled to begin at 8 pm IST, with toss to take place at 7.30 pm IST.

The 2024 T20 World Cup Super Eight match between India and Afghanistan will be telecast on the Star Sports Network TV channels. As for live streaming, you can watch the match on the Disney +Hotstar app (Free) and the website (Subscription).
Others: India finished Group A as table toppers with seven points from four matches. This included three wins and one washout (Against Canada in Florida).

Afghanistan beat Uganda by 125 runs before stunning New Zealand by 84 runs in their second match. The Rashid Khan-led side carried on their clinical display into the third match against Papua New Guinea, whom they beat by seven wickets. Afghanistan, however, suffered a 106-run defeat to West Indies in their final group stage match, failing to chase down a target of 219.
